decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location Plan No. 2016-098-001, and Drawing nos. 2016-098-003, 2016-098-004, 2016-098-005, 2016-098-008, 2016-098-009, 2016-098-020, 2016-098-021, 2016-098-022, 2016-098-024, and 2016-098-026 Received: 5 October 2016, and Drawing nos. 2016-098-006A, 2016-098-007A, 2016-098-023A, and 2016-098-025A received: 7 December 2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Erection of a rear roof extension to first floor flat with two roof windows to front elevation
